item.title: Hello World! Welcome to my First Jekyll Blog!
item.description: Blogging isn’t my thing, and I never imagined setting up a blog using Jekyll. Recently starting the new blog with Jekyll and loving it . I could be able to setup this blog in 4 hours :D Just amazing. I wasted an hour in these 4 hrs just because I didn’t realize that changes in _config.yml will be not reload automatically like the way it happens for scss, css, html, md files.
